eqnarray:
\begin{eqnarray}
\label{oursol}
ds_d^2 &=& [\cosh\tilde c (t-t_2)]^{2 \frac{q+1}{\Delta}}
\Bigg[ e^{2c_0 t+2c_0'} \left\{ - e^{2ng(t)} dt^2
+ e^{2g(t)}d\Sigma_{n,\sigma}^2\right\} \nonumber\\
&& \hspace{20 mm} +\; \sum_{\alpha=1}^p [\cosh\tilde c(t-t_2)]^{- 2
\frac{\gamma^{(\alpha)}}{\Delta}} e^{2 \tilde c_\alpha t+2c_\alpha'} (dx^\alpha)^2\Bigg], \\
E &=& \sqrt{\frac{2(d-2)}{\Delta}}\frac{e^{\tilde c(t-t_2)
-\epsilon a c_\phi'/2+\sum_{\alpha\in q} c_\alpha'}}{\cosh \tilde c(t-t_2)},\quad
\tilde c = \sum_{\alpha\in q} c_\alpha-\frac{1}{2} c_\phi \epsilon a, \nonumber\\
\phi &=& \frac{(d-2)\epsilon a}{\Delta} \ln \cosh\tilde c(t-t_2)
+\tilde c_\phi t + c_\phi',
\label{oursol1}
\

\begin{eqnarray}
&& \tilde c = 3c-\frac{1}{2} c_\phi \epsilon a, \quad
c_0 = \frac{3}{\Delta}\tilde c - \frac{3}{n-1}c, \quad
c_0' =-\frac{3}{n-1}c', \nonumber\\
&& \beta = \sqrt{\frac{3(n+2)}{n(n-1)^2} c^2 + \frac{1}{2n(n-1)}c_\phi^2}.
\

\begin{eqnarray}
ds_d^2 &=& [\cosh 3c(t-t_2)]^{2/(n-1)} \Bigg[ -e^{2ng(t)-6c'/(n-1)} dt^2
+ e^{2g(t)-6c'/(n-1)}d\Sigma_{n,\sigma}^2 \nonumber\\
&& \hspace{20 mm} +\; [\cosh 3c(t-t_2)]^{- 2(n+2)/3(n-1)2c_\alpha'} d{\bf x}^2\Bigg].
\

\begin{eqnarray}
\phi &=& \frac{1}{4} \ln [\cosh 3c (t-t_2)] + \frac{3}{4} (c+2c_4)t
+ \frac{3}{2} c'_4, \nonumber\\
ds_{10,s}^2 &=& e^{2\phi/3} [\cosh 3c (t-t_2)]^{1/3}\Bigg[
e^{-(c+2c_4)t/5 - 2(3c'+c_4')/5} \left\{ - e^{12 g(t)} dt^2
+ e^{2g(t)}d\Sigma_{6,\sigma}^2\right\} \nonumber\\
&& \hspace{20 mm} +\; [\cosh 3c(t-t_2)]^{-1} e^{2c'} d{\bf x}^2 \Bigg].
\

\begin{eqnarray}
\label{dfactor}
\delta(t) &=& [\cosh (16\alpha/5)(t-t_2)]^{3/16} e^{g(t) -3c_1t/64 - 3\tilde c'/4},\nonumber\\
S(t) &=& [\cosh (16\alpha/5)(t-t_2)]^{1/4} e^{3g(t) -c_1 t/16 - \tilde c'},\\
\phi &=& \frac{1}{4}\ln[\cosh(16\alpha/5)(t-t_2)] +\frac{15}{16}c_1 t +c_\phi',
\nonumber
\
